desc: Shop for quality alpaca sweaters, ponchos, blankets and winter accessories at www.alpamowi.com Visit our website to find more about our products. At AlpaMowi, we care deeply about alpacas and source our fibers from ethical alpaca farms in Peru and Ecuador.

layout.text: Warmer than wool, alpaca fibre is hypoallergenic and extremely comfortable on the skin. It also has a natural sheen to it offering the ponchos an opulent feel. The high elasticity of the Alpaca fibre makes for flattering ponchos that conform to your body shape
